game.name: Ghosts of Tabor
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Ghosts of Tabor is VRs only FPS PVP and PVE survival game where you will use your wits, skills and resources to survive. Inspired by games such as Escape from Tarkov and DayZ, featuring different scenarios from scavenging to looting and crafting. Will you survive long enough to make it out alive?
